abstract: Sticker prices for the bigger and brawnier 2007 Tundra will begin at $22,290 for the most basic model and go as high as $41,850.
snippet: Sticker prices for the bigger and brawnier 2007 Tundra will begin at $22,290 for the most basic model and go as high as $41,850.
lead_paragraph: DETROIT, Jan. 24 — Toyota is putting its reputation as a premium automaker to a test by pricing its redesigned pickup, the Tundra, several thousand dollars higher than comparable trucks made by General Motors and Ford.

headline.main: Redesigned Toyota Pickup to Cost More Than Rivals’ Trucks
headline.print_headline: Redesigned Toyota Pickup to Cost More Than Rivals’ Trucks

byline.original: By Nick Bunkley and Micheline Maynard
